name: Upsala Garden Society Award Medal
obverse: A woman wearing a classic robe holds a bundle of flowers in her right hand and a cornucopia of flowers in her left hand.
obverse_inscriptions: ODLA MED OMSORG FÄLTET DU FÅTT.
reverse: A wreath encompasses the award inscription. A Maltese-like cross is at the bottom.
reverse_inscriptions: vid Utstallningen 1875 till A. F. Pihlgren
references: Sveriges och svenska konungahusets minnespenningar p. 531 #46
description: This medal was used as an award medal for members of the Upsala Garden Society.
